dt-option.description:
Identical to `dt-init headerCallback` but for the table footer this function allows you to modify the table footer on every 'draw' event.

		Note that if the table does not have a `-tag tfoot` element, it this callback will not be fired.
dt-option.name: footerCallback

example.title: Alter the content of the footer on callback
Use the API to sum a specific column and output

parameter.content: `-tag tfoot` element of the table's footer
parameter.name: tfoot

parameter.content: Full data array of the table. Note that this is in data index order. Use the `display` parameter for the current display order.
parameter.name: data

parameter.content: Index for the current display starting point in the display array
parameter.name: start

parameter.content: Index for the current display ending point in the display array
parameter.name: end

parameter.content: Index array to translate the visual position to the full data array
parameter.name: display

type.signature: footerCallback( tfoot, data, start, end, display )
